title: In search of earthquakes
creator_credit: Alex Pomasanoff, Alan Landsburg Productions and Pyramid Films
brief_description: Examines several major earthquakes and summarises the current technology of earthquake prediction. Traces the 500 mile San Andreas fault and shows its definite movements.
creator_credit_for_label: Alex Pomasanoff, Alan Landsburg Productions and Pyramid Films
